msg: LUCENE-2510: Add a test that actually "tries" to create a instance from the factory, which currently does not work for all factories (like ResourceLoader required - we have no default Impl outside Solr, or required parameters missing). At least it tests that we get InitializationException. Unfortunatley if ResourceLoaderAware.inform() is not called, some factories NPE or similar. We should fix later and make it better useable outside Solr
